actions.name: user_profile
actions.description: Receives the patient's pre-filled profile from the web app (cancer type, stage, prior treatments, biomarkers, location)

actions.name: trial_selected
actions.description: User clicked on a trial card in the UI. The payload contains nct_id (e.g. NCT06710223). Call mcp-tools_get_trial_details with this nct_id and explain the trial details.

actions.name: add_criteria
actions.description: Update the patient's profile sidebar with newly confirmed eligibility criteria

actions.name: show_trials
actions.description: Display matching clinical trials in the UI

actions.name: update_match_count
actions.description: Update the estimated matching trial count in the sidebar

actions.name: clear_trials
actions.description: Clear the trial results from the UI

actions.name: show_trial_details
actions.description: Display detailed trial information in a modal. Send after calling mcp-tools_get_trial_details. Include: nct_id, title, phase, status, locations, summary, eligibility (array), description, sponsor, contact (object with name/phone/email).
